Medicine_tweet_52_r.News Finding:
Neonatal regulatory behavior problems are predicted by maternal early pregnancy overweight & obesity

A number of 3117 women of the PREDO Study filled in a questionnaire on regulatory behavior problems at the child’s mean age of 16.9 days
Medicine_tweet_52_r.Paper Finding: Our findings suggest that prevention of overweight/obesity in women of childbearing age will benefit the offspring by reducing the burden of regulatory problems in infancy and preventing their long-term neurodevelopmental consequences.
Medicine_tweet_52_r.News Context:
Neonatal regulatory behavior problems are predicted by maternal early pregnancy overweight & obesity

A number of 3117 women of the PREDO Study filled in a questionnaire on regulatory behavior problems at the child’s mean age of 16.9 days
Medicine_tweet_52_r.Paper Context: In sum, our study showed that infants of overweight/obese mothers displayed higher levels of regulatory behavior problems and were more likely to display problems on multiple areas of behavioral self-regulation. Regulatory behavior problems partially mediated the effects of maternal overweight/obesity on childhood developmental milestones. Our findings suggest that prevention of overweight/obesity in women of childbearing age will benefit the offspring by reducing the burden of regulatory problems in infancy and preventing their long-term neurodevelopmental consequences.
Medicine_tweet_52_r.text: ['Finding: Neonatal regulatory behavior problems are predicted by maternal early pregnancy overweight & obesity A number of 3117 women of the PREDO Study filled in a questionnaire on regulatory behavior problems at the child’s mean age of 16.9 days ']
Medicine_tweet_52_r.displayed_text: Finding: Neonatal regulatory behavior problems are predicted by maternal early pregnancy overweight & obesity A number of 3117 women of the PREDO Study filled in a questionnaire on regulatory behavior problems at the child’s mean age of 16.9 days

Medicine_tweet_110_r.News Finding: #sr Stepwise-binding process w/ decreasing affinity:Structural basis for Ca2+ selectivity of voltage-gated Ca channel
Medicine_tweet_110_r.Paper Finding: This pore architecture suggests a conduction pathway involving transitions between two main states with one or two hydrated Ca 21 ions bound in the selectivity filter and supports a 'knock-off' mechanism of ion permeation through a stepwisebinding process.
Medicine_tweet_110_r.News Context: #sr Stepwise-binding process w/ decreasing affinity:Structural basis for Ca2+ selectivity of voltage-gated Ca channel
Medicine_tweet_110_r.Paper Context: Our results reveal interactions of hydrated Ca 21 with two high-affinity Ca 21 -binding sites followed by a third lower-affinity site that would coordinate Ca 21 as it moves inward. This pore architecture suggests a conduction pathway involving transitions between two main states with one or two hydrated Ca 21 ions bound in the selectivity filter and supports a 'knock-off' mechanism of ion permeation through a stepwisebinding process. The multi-ion selectivity filter of our Ca V Ab model establishes a structural framework for understanding the mechanisms of ion selectivity and conductance by vertebrate Ca V channels.
Medicine_tweet_110_r.text: ['Finding: #sr Stepwise-binding process w/ decreasing affinity:Structural basis for Ca2+ selectivity of voltage-gated Ca channel ']
Medicine_tweet_110_r.displayed_text: Finding: #sr Stepwise-binding process w/ decreasing affinity:Structural basis for Ca2+ selectivity of voltage-gated Ca channel

Medicine_190_r.News Finding: The researchers found as long as the levels remained above 0.5 percent, the sponges could survive.
Medicine_190_r.Paper Finding: Therefore, the oxygen requirements of sponges might be relatively low .
Medicine_190_r.News Context: When oxygen levels dropped to zero, some died. The researchers found as long as the levels remained above 0.5 percent, the sponges could survive. "There must have been other ecological and evolutionary mechanisms at play.
Medicine_190_r.Paper Context: Because these cells are always in direct contact with seawater, they do not rely on the diffusion of oxygen from the external environment into the interior of the animal, nor do they require oxygen delivery via a true circulatory system. Therefore, the oxygen requirements of sponges might be relatively low . Sponges were also observed on the Volcano 7 seamount in the eastern tropical Pacific, where oxygen concentrations ranged from 4.5 to 7.2 μM O 2 .
Medicine_190_r.text: ['Finding: The researchers found as long as the levels remained above 0.5 percent, the sponges could survive.']
Medicine_190_r.displayed_text: Finding: The researchers found as long as the levels remained above 0.5 percent, the sponges could survive.

Medicine_396_r.News Finding: The data also show that the destination of the illegally trafficked ivory increasingly shifted to China.
Medicine_396_r.Paper Finding: At the intensively monitored site, illegal killing increased markedly after 2008 and was correlated strongly with the local black market ivory price and increased seizures of ivory destined for China.
Medicine_396_r.News Context: This surge was directly correlated to a more than quadrupling of local black-market ivory prices paid to poachers and tripling in the volume and number of illegal ivory seizures through Kenyan ports of transit. The data also show that the destination of the illegally trafficked ivory increasingly shifted to China. Such figures cause conservationists alarm, as the study shows over 54 percent is a level of poaching that elephant birth rates are unable to overcome and will lead to population decline.
Medicine_396_r.Paper Context: At the intensively monitored site, illegal killing increased markedly after 2008 and was correlated strongly with the local black market ivory price and increased seizures of ivory destined for China. More broadly, results from application to continental data indicated illegal killing levels were unsustainable for the species between 2010 and 2012, peaking to ∼8% in 2011 which extrapolates to ∼40,000 elephants illegally killed and a probable species reduction of ∼3% that year. Preliminary data from 2013 indicate overharvesting continued.
Medicine_396_r.text: ['Finding: The data also show that the destination of the illegally trafficked ivory increasingly shifted to China.']
Medicine_396_r.displayed_text: Finding: The data also show that the destination of the illegally trafficked ivory increasingly shifted to China.

Medicine_13_r.News Finding: The title lays it out plainly: "Violent video game engagement is not associated with adolescents' aggressive behaviour."
Medicine_13_r.Paper Finding: Despite the null findings identified in the present study, history gives us reason to suspect the idea that violent video games drives aggressive behaviour will remain an unsettled question for parents, pundits and policy-makers.
Medicine_13_r.News Context: The title lays it out plainly: "Violent video game engagement is not associated with adolescents' aggressive behaviour." Their top-line finding is that their study "did not support the position that violent gaming relates to aggressive behaviour." This contradicts the consensus hammered out by an American Psychological Association task force on violent video games in 2017.
Medicine_13_r.Paper Context: Until such findings are confirmed, however, we strongly would caution about drawing impulsive, thoughtless or potentially stigmatizing conclusions about members of such groups . Despite the null findings identified in the present study, history gives us reason to suspect the idea that violent video games drives aggressive behaviour will remain an unsettled question for parents, pundits and policy-makers. Although our results do have implications for these stakeholders, the present work holds special significance for those studying technology effects, in general, and video games, in particular.
Medicine_13_r.text: ['Finding: The title lays it out plainly: "Violent video game engagement is not associated with adolescents\' aggressive behaviour."']
Medicine_13_r.displayed_text: Finding: The title lays it out plainly: "Violent video game engagement is not associated with adolescents' aggressive behaviour."

Medicine_tweet_206_r.News Finding: Increased risk for type 1 #diabetes following common entero-#virus infection in #children. #autoimmunity...
Medicine_tweet_206_r.Paper Finding: Conclusions/interpretation This nationwide retrospective cohort study found a positive correlation between type 1 diabetes and EV infection.
Medicine_tweet_206_r.News Context: Increased risk for type 1 #diabetes following common entero-#virus infection in #children. #autoimmunity...
Medicine_tweet_206_r.Paper Context: The HRs of type 1 diabetes in children with allergic rhinitis, bronchial asthma or either one of these atopic diseases showed more variation than in those children without these diseases. Conclusions/interpretation This nationwide retrospective cohort study found a positive correlation between type 1 diabetes and EV infection. The results suggest that a preventive strategy, such as an effective vaccine against EV infection, may lessen the incidence of type 1 diabetes in Taiwan.
Medicine_tweet_206_r.text: ['Finding: Increased risk for type 1 #diabetes following common entero-#virus infection in #children. #autoimmunity... ']
Medicine_tweet_206_r.displayed_text: Finding: Increased risk for type 1 #diabetes following common entero-#virus infection in #children. #autoimmunity...
